content: Serving miners since 2021, reliable hosting in Asia has recently undergone expansion. Slots are available, accepting both ASIC and GPU miners. Rates start from USD 0.10/kWh, volume discounts apply.We also offer Turnkey or Custom fit out for privacy.Chat with us for more details!I know lots of folks will pour cold water, or advise otherwise. Give us a chance and talk to us!
